kjv_def: abundance, (far more) exceeding, excellency, more excellent, beyond (out of) measure
strongs_def: a throwing beyond others, i.e. (figuratively) supereminence; adverbially (with G1519 (ὑπερβολή) or G2596 (ὑπερβολή)) pre- eminently
outline:
1. a throwing beyond
  2. metaph.
    1. superiority, excellence, pre-eminence
    2. beyond measure, exceedingly, preeminently
    3. beyond all measure
